snippet.title: REMNANT
snippet.description:
Wishlist Today on VoxPop: https://rb.gy/kxvwv7

A cosmic evil known only as, The Crying God, has enveloped Earth's Moon. 

Releasing fungal growth with every waxing and waning. 

This is known as the “Gray Death”, the fungus fuses man and beast, living and undead, into horrible otherworldly abominations. 

Here we follow the remnants of earth’s survivors across the globe, as they STRIVE to survive one more night...

Enter Beyond the Gray Death!

Developed by Salt & Pixel, LLC.
Published by VoxPop Games, Inc.

*A hyper Minimalist gameplay loop with advanced roguelite elements. 

Each player (1-2 players) picks from 8 survivors with various weapons and skills to battle against unending waves of creatures. 

As the difficulty increases, the player will be able to upgrade and gain new weapons and powers. 

Each map is massive and through exploration the player will discover other survivor hold outs and treasure. Cumulating to a huge boss battle.*
